courses.title: Guitar for Beginners
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the guitar, from chords to strumming patterns, in this beginner-friendly course.

courses.title: Music Theory Essentials
courses.description: Understand the fundamental concepts of music theory, including scales, chords, and rhythm.

courses.title: Piano Masterclass
courses.description: Take your piano skills to the next level with this comprehensive course, covering advanced techniques and pieces.

courses.title: Songwriting 101
courses.description: Learn the art of songwriting, from crafting lyrics to composing melodies, in this step-by-step guide.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Create your own electronic music using popular digital audio workstations and production techniques.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Develop your improvisation skills and explore the world of jazz with this in-depth course.

courses.title: Music Production with Logic Pro
courses.description: Master the powerful tools of Logic Pro to produce professional-quality music.

courses.title: Vocal Training for Singers
courses.description: Improve your vocal technique and learn how to sing with confidence in this specialized course.

courses.title: DJing Essentials
courses.description: Get started with DJing by learning how to mix tracks, beatmatch, and create your own DJ sets.

courses.title: Film Scoring Basics
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of composing music for films and create your own original scores.
